content: Rayonier Advanced Materials said it raised its offer price for Canadian paper and cellulose pulp maker Tembec Inc to C$4.75 per share  valuing the deal at C$475 million ($378.6 million)  excluding debt.
name: Rayonier Inc
title: Rayonier Advanced raises offer for Canada's Tembec to C$475 million
